data.title: Divine Persuasion Studio
data.meta_description: Hi. We are Divine Persuasion Studio. We help churches, thought leaders, and non-profits tell the most beautiful story in the world. We use graphic design, motion + video, and creative direction to help take your church’s creative content to out-of-the-stratosphere levels.
data.text:
A partnership built on your vision and community by people who deeply care about the greatest story ever told. The only platform built for your church to scale design, marketing, and creative operations with world-class-art.

If you're struggling to find, keep, and afford high-quality creative resources, the search is over.

Art Direction - Branding - Visual Design & Merch - Motion Design & Video

Creative Operations Software - On-Demand Customer Support

CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE

ESSENTIALS

$2,999.99/mo

The essentials plan is built to cover and deliver your core content needs like sermon series designs and socials.

20 Project Credits/mo

Monthly Creative Connect

2 Users

Visual Design

Motion Design and Video Clips

Dedicated Creative Manager

Tailored onboarding for your team

Adobe File Access

Full-service Project Management Platform

Contact Us

PREMIUM

Let's Talk!

The perfect tier for churches with multiple ministries, building not only your core sermon series designs but supporting other events, ministries, and segments of your church.

40 Project Credits/mo

2 Creative Connects/mo

4 Users

Trusted by

“Super happy with the core style Guide Presentation. The team is world-class, and we love our starting point. It feels so special. It’s what we’ve been wanting to create but didn’t know how! It fits us culturally and elevates us creatively. I’m beyond grateful and happy with it.”

Local Church SD

“Streamlined, customer-focused systems and great design make DPS an excellent choice for any Church’s Creative needs"

Churchome

"DPS made me the kind of Creative Director I always wanted to be. DPS is the reason so many creatives started coming to our church"

Gospelife

"With DPS, I could just put in design requests and trust that they'd come back stellar. I was able to focus on building and training a full team of creatives- some of which never picked up a camera, design, etc."

Lifted Church

"DPS has elevated our overall look. They came through last minute for some crucial Easter looks that ended up blowing our community away!"

Church For The City

“DPS has been a huge asset for our creative department. They partner with our team, offer advice and create beautiful content.”

Trinity New York

"DPS has been a game changer for us. They have helped us elevate our overall brand. We believe Jesus deserves excellent art and they have helped us achieve that. Their team has been first-class and phenomenal to work with. Our partnership with them has been a major blessing!”

Love Church Omaha
